front.title: DNS64: DNS extensions for Network Address Translation from IPv6 Clients to IPv4 Servers

abstract.t: DNS64 is a mechanism for synthesizing AAAA records from A records.DNS64 is used with NAT64, an IPv6 IPv4 translator to enable client-server communication between an IPv6-only client and an IPv4-onlyserver, without requiring any changes to either the IPv6 or the IPv4node, for the class of applications that work through NATs. Thisdocument specifies DNS64, and provides suggestions on how it shouldbe deployed in conjunction with NAT64.
